Rates

XP/SP Rate: x55
Adena Rate: x25
Drop/Spoil Rate: 12x/25x
Quest Drop Rate: 4x
Enchant Safe/Max Value: +4/+12
Normal Scroll Chance: 58%
Blessed Scroll Chance: 65%
Attributes St. Rate Chance: 65%
Attributes Cr. Rate Chance: 60%
Buff/Dance Slots Value: 32/14
Buff Time Value: 2 hour
Max. Clients per PC Value: 5
Olympiad Heroes are chosen every 2 weeks, at 1st and 15th of each month. The Hero will be the individual who has accumulated the most Olympiad points according to their main class, has competed more than 9 times in that period, and claimed at least 1 victory. The maximum competition time is 6 minutes, and the player whose HP drops to 0 first will lose. GameMaxLimit = 70 , GameClassesCountLimit = 30, GameNoClassesCountLimit = 60 , GameTeamCountLimit = 10 If no victor has emerged at the 6 minute mark, the character who has inflicted the most damage will be determined the winner. The damage inflicted on an opponent's servitor is not considered in this determination. HWID Protection and antifeed system helping you for fair matches. Starting points are 50, and every week you gain 25. Max enchant on olympiad is +6, even if your items are enchantet over +6
